features: Dynamic Duomax® technology helps reduce pronation
Rearfoot and forefoot GEL® technology cushioning provides excellent shock absorption
Flytefoam™ Propel technology cushioning increases impact absorption and responsiveness
Guidance Line™ technology creates a more consistent stride
Aharplus™ heel plug improves the outsole durability
I.G.S™ technology improves cushioning, protection, and stability
Lite-Show™ technology improves visibility in low-light conditions
